short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Publishes a tweet as soon as possible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter publish ASAP is an innovative Chrome extension designed for Twitter enthusiasts and social media professionals who desire a faster, more streamlined tweeting experience. This extension revolutionizes the way users interact with Twitter by enabling them to compose and send tweets directly from their browser toolbar, without the need to switch tabs or navigate to the Twitter website.
